documents.document:
My Twilight

My twilight is dimming.
All there is is blackness.
No light can help me now.
Its too late to save me
From this darkness that's
taking over.

My twilight is gone.
Darkness is all around me.
Run before it comes your way.
Save yourself its too late for me.
Hurry you still have time.

My twilight is gone now
There is a thirst I can not place
overtaking me.
The thirst is unbearable.
I need to sustain it but how?

The thirst No water can help me.
It has to be blood.
Blood I don know why but blood
all the same.
come to me help me with my thirst.

Total darkness you can't see me.
Good thats the way I want it.
It needs to stay that way.
Just a few more steps and you
are mine.

Mine to keep and to drink from.
You can't get away.
Its all over for you now.

No stay away from me. You can't help me.
Only the thirst can you help now.
Nothing in your power can help me with
my pain.

No What have I done?
It can't be how could i have done that
to my own friend?
No help me please I can't stand it.
Help me please help me in whatever way
that you can.
Just help me.

No Stay away.

My twilight is returning.
I feel relieved.
It was just a dream.Or was it?
It wasn't.
I see a body on the floor drained of blood.
Not a friend a family member.
No. Not my sister. No.

I need to get out of here.
Now i must leave and never come back.
how will I manage this thirst though.
Its still here.

MUST RUN AND NEVER LOOK BACK.

Left Out

My head is spinning back to reality.
Where has every one gone?
Oh wait no one would be in my room but me.
I hear no voices upstairs.

When I reach the top of my stairs I see no one in the kitchen.
My mom would normally be cooking dinner at this time.
Walking into the living room I look at the couch and love seat.
My sister and brother aren here.
They would be watching TV.

Walking into the hallway.
I walk to my brothers room look in and see no one.
Counting to my sisters room I look in. No sister.
Finley I reach my parents room. No parents.
My dad would be on the computer right now but he isn .
Where could they be?

Walking back thruogh the hallway and living room.
I find myself in the dinning room theres a not on the table.
I must of must of missed that.
Looking at it I relies one thing.
They left me out of a family outing.

Why did they leave me out?
I have no clue.
Where they unable to whack me?
But i wasn sleeping.
Did they call my name and I not answer?
But I wasn listening to my CD player.

What I was doing was thinking.
Thinking of things the family can do and things to wright.
Why didn my mom come down to my room and get me?
I have no idea.

I have found they have been leaving me out often.
Why should i think this would be any different.
They left me all alone.
The only thing I can do now is get on the computer or call a friend.

Why do I have to be left out?
Its my life too.
And I should be able to live it with them.

True Love For a Vampire

Life is deteriorating right at this moment.
I am lest affected I am invisible to all.
No one see me hears me or knows me.
I slip through the crowds unnoticed.
No one realizes they have a vampire in there mist.
No one can tell when they actually look hard enough to see me.
But once they look they turn away than turn and look again and I am no longer there.

But in one crowd.
I was looked at more than once longer than most by one man.
Than finally he walked over to me.
I could not bare to move a muscle.
Never before has this happened.
I stand still as a statue as I have in the past when people glance at me.

He walked over to me.
Telling me he knows what I am but not who I am.
I simple stated that know one knows who I am that hardly any one knows what I am.
I asked him what he wants from me.
He didn’t reply but tilted his head and bared his neck and whispered “bite.”
“Not here not now. Follow me and I shell.”

He followed me to an ally so dark he could hardly see.
But he still did follow and stood in front of me when I stopped.
Bearing his neck to me again I bite the pulse in his neck and sucked hard to get that sweet delicate juice.
But I realize it is not so sweet the blood flow not as fast.
“What are you?” I asked when I released his neck.
“I a one to.”

So now we go together and stay together.
No one notices us but some glance and see nothing.
Though those that look think they feel someone looking at them.
Now me and Jesse for that is his name are never apart.
You may think you see us you may not.
Walking through the crowds together picking out our pray together.
Never leaving each others side.

Wind

The wind hits my face and pushes my hair out behind me
The wind feels so refreshing to my skin
I feel it caressing my face like a hand
Chills run down my spin from the feel of it

Walking alone at night
Feeling the cool breeze run over my body
Feeling like someone’s with me on this dark night
I welcome the feelings and give into the night

I see a face form in the wind
I see it for a second than it’s gone
The wind is my companion now
Nothing else matters but to be out in the night
With the wind blowing in my face

Oh how I love the feel of the wind
Now I am not alone
My boyfriend joins me
Holding hands as we walk through the wind
Just us two in the night till the end of time

Darkness

Darkness falls and I am all alone.
No family to comfort me.
No friends to stay with.
Just me and the Darkness surrounding me.

No body cares.
Nobody thinks.
Nobody see the world they live in.
See all this hate that makes their world darker.
The darker it is the more hateful the person.

All I see is blobs of Darkness.
The Darkness is surrounding each and every person.
Some darker than others.
Mine is the darkest but not from hate.
But from the natural way that I am.

My Darkness changes though.
Some times it converges with others and makes them hate more.
Other times it makes them hate less.

Manley I just stay away from others.
Sometimes others stray my way but I avoid them.
On some rare occasion I stay to see what happens.
Its not always good because sometimes there is hardly any Darkness around some and it just makes darker.

My Darkness is made by others Darkness.
My Darkness is a world of chaos.
A world of neglect isolation.
A world were no one seems to see me.
A world were I live away from other people.
A world were my own family doesn’t know me.

Colors

The colors that are around me are getting dull.
The greens, yellows, and pinks turn pale.
The oranges, grays, and browns turn pale and chalky.
The reds, blues, and purples mix together.
The blacks just stay the same or get a little lighter.

This all seems impossible.
I love the blues, purples, and reds so why are they mixing?
The greens, yellows, and pinks I could really care less about.
The oranges, grays, and browns are ok.
And black I just love.

Than I realize I’m seeing people’s moods and feelings.
Right now my friend Danielle is re, for anger.
A little kid named Reece is yellow, for happens or joy.
A guy named Nate is purple, for having a perverted mind.
Me I have a mix of purple, blue, red and black.
Blue for being calm and black for depression.

The colors are all over the place.
Some duller than others, some brighter.
The duller the color the less the emotion or feeling.
The brighter the color the more some one felt.

Suddenly the colors go away and all I see is the natural colors of nature.
Peoples skin tone are normal, their colors too.
No more confusion for my part.
Thank God.

Gothic Girl

Dried
red rose,
the cutting
and sad wilted
reminder of your
cruel broken promise
to respect our love and wait here.

Now death fills up my tattered heart,
as the choking smell of the rose seethes
like a corpse rotting in an unmarked grave.

Misplaced, alone and confused in anger,
I lay upon the freshly tilled dirt,
longing to smell you once again.
Soil and petals slip between
my dry brittle fingers
and mascara runs.

Dead long ago,
my one rose
laid to
rest.

(a friend wrote this not me)

Gothic

My family calls me a Goth because I wear black.
I can’t help it I like the color black.
Black is like m signature color.
I am always wearing black in some form.
Weather it is my nail polish, my clothes, or my make-up.

Well I am always wearing black nail polish and make-up.
So I guess I’m maybe Semi-Goth.
But I might possibly turn full Goth.
Besides there are Gothic people who aren’t always depressed.
So what does it matter if I’m Goth or not?

Besides Goths like some things I like anyways.
Goths are into vampires and stuff like that.
They like wearing black, I do too.
Although they wear black from head to toe.
I don’t, but I do wear a lot of black.

Goths are cool
They are people I would possibly hang with.
Goths make their life the way they want it to be.
I want to make my life what I want it to be not the life I have right now.
Goths are rebellious, so ain’t I.

I think I want to be a Goth.
I think I maybe turning into a Goth.
If I am I think I will like it better.

The Key to My Heart

He has the key to my heart.
Only he can unlock it.
Only he can see the true me.
He is the one I give my love to.

He has the key to my heart.
I trust him not to lose that key.
That is the only key that I have left.
If he loses that hey then I’ll be done.

In the past I was foolish enough to give out keys.
The guys before all lost their keys I gave them.
Now I know that they never truly loved me.
I should have never given keys to false love.

His key will be the last,
For my heart can’t take the heartbreak again.
It won’t take the heartbreak again
If my heartbreaks again, I will have breathed my last.

He has the key to my heart.
His is a special key.
His kill will unlock all of me.
That is if he turns it right.

The thing with his key,
Is that the key will only work if he truly loves me.
Otherwise it is no more.
And so I shell be too.
